channel.title: Drop rates, java version [PI]
channel.description:
i am using a PI source and the drop rates are awefull... Dust devils drop dragon almost EVERY time! There are these custom ceartures called Ibanian demons... THEY HAVE A 100% RARE DROP RATE :o how can i edit these?
Thanks :D
EDIT: in my cleint folder i have a 32 bit client and a 64 bit, for the 64 bit client you NEED to have java JRE7, is it possible for it to auto detect your java JRE version? because not everyone has JRE7, they might have 5 or 6...
my client run thing:
@echo off color 0a cd ./Client/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

item.title: Drop rates, java version [PI]
item.dc:creator: @KraytascapeFTW KraytascapeFTW
item.description:
@KraytascapeFTW wrote:

i am using a PI source and the drop rates are awefull… Dust devils drop dragon almost EVERY time!
There are these custom ceartures called Ibanian demons… THEY HAVE A 100% RARE DROP RATE :o
how can i edit these?

Thanks

EDIT: in my cleint folder i have a 32 bit client and a 64 bit, for the 64 bit client you NEED to have java JRE7, is it possible for it to auto detect your java JRE version? because not everyone has JRE7, they might have 5 or 6…

my client run thing:

@echo off
color 0a
cd ./Client/
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1024m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

Read full topic
